A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Except from longer review:\n\nOverall\, I was entertained enough by \"The Last Jedi\". However\, it simply doesn't feel like it's worthy of having the name \"Star Wars\" behind it. Tonally\, it feels off\, and its story is a bit sketchy. It's a better film than its predecessor\, but that's not saying a whole lot. It has a few great scenes\, and is definitely worth a watch\, but it just doesn't feel like Star Wars. It mishandles several legendary characters in favor of focusing on hip\, out of place millennial-like ones. That just isn't what I want in a Star Wars movie. This would be a great fan film. Too bad it's supposed to be part of the Star Wars canon. Unfortunate this is...
